content: The signature campaign is one of the interesting campaigns in a bounty campaign that not only gives additional knowledge about crypto but also gives more rewards to a campaign. but only certain levels can follow it. How can we go to class??

comments.author: sabine80
comments.body: write good comments, help other people and you'll get merit. dont just focus on bounties, be useful to this forum. then you will be rewarded for it. deal with the topic of merit. there are many good threads with tips on how to earn it.Newbies - Read before postinghttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.msg16958010#msg16958010

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: You must have contributed a lot to the forum and it's better if you are visiting another section like beginner and help section. You're here aiming for the reward and not contributing to the forum. I guess there will be lots of things that must be learned before you will be achieved more rank. It's better if you are also reading the guidelines to be a good poster. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1684035.0

comments.author: bonyaserg
comments.body: Over the years I have been involved in various projects. And as soon as I see that there is a subscription company in this project, I always participate with great joy and share my opinion. And also I'm interested in the opinion of other participants. Since I learn a lot of new things for myself on the signature forum. So for beginners, I can say that this signing forum is very interesting and gives great knowledge in the crypto industry.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: For now you have to focus more on understanding the forum, learning everything useful regarding crypto in general from all the learned members of this great forum and building your account alongside by contributing positively in anyway you can to support the forum. Doing this will surely earn you merit depending on your creativity and contribution, beside that there is no special class to attend. Your focus should be on building your account to level up in other to be able to participate in signature campaigns.

comments.author: Issa56
comments.body: I think the first thing you will do before you can participate in signature campaign is to have merit, you get merit by making positive impact on the forum, but I think you should go true the forum rules because most people always go against the forum rules when trying to rank up, always make sure you avoid plagiarism because that's one of the serious problem newbies are always having. Make sure you understand the forum first, don't be after the merit you are looking for just because you want to join signature.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: What does this have to do with altcoins? Signature campaigns don't give you any knowledge. But if you publish interesting and quality posts, you can get paid for it. So if you want to be a part of these campaigns, you should have already gathered some baggage of knowledge and practical experience in the crypto space that you can talk about in your posts.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Merit comes naturally when you have lots of information and knowledge on your mind.  Just listen to the earlier reply.  Focus on gaining knowledge and roam the forum and take advantage of the opportunity to help members who are asking for pieces of information and suggestions regarding anything that interests them that is related to crypto and this forum.

comments.author: waybesuricata
comments.body: You should open topics that will help people and at the same time make useful comments. If you do it this way, forum users will give you merit. At the same time, merit resources will also give you plenty of merit, when you see that you are constantly making useful posts.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: woez on July 09, 2022, 12:18:02 PMThe signature campaign is one of the interesting campaigns in a bounty campaign that not only gives additional knowledge about crypto but also gives more rewards to a campaign. but only certain levels can follow it. How can we go to class??It is definitely true that the best bounty campaigns are only available for the ranks of Full Member or above. Some of them are even exclusively for Hero or Legendary members. First of all i have to say that the people that have registered on this forum a long time ago were pretty lucky because they could have ranked up to Legendary pretty easily only with writing posts, asking questions or whatever. Nowadays you don't only need activity but also Merit, which means you need to write a post that another user finds so helpful, funny or whatever that he manually sends you one of his Merits as a reward. Sometimes this is not really fair because it is possible that you write a great post or that you are directly answering a question of another member and you still don't get any merit for it.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: You are wrong, signature campaign has nothing to do in helping you Knowledge of crypto-currency, Rather it’s the other way round, you knowledge of crypto-currency will make you make constructive post that would earn you a good status to be able to be on a signature campaign, but for what it worth that should not be your priority concern right now, go in search of the knowledge and rest the idea of a signature campaign till you are ready.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Most signatures (excluding those that accept spammers or negative trust profiles) require the author to be a user who can write quality comments or be able to add a value to a discussion here on forum. This Is the way. No One want read comments without real value.

comments.author: zonefloor
comments.body: you need to produce quality comments and content for the forum and its members. For example, you can increase your chances of winning a merit by supporting the necessary titles with new information. However, since merit is not easily earned, it is not given in abundance by everyone. As you produce high-value content, you can see that there are plenty of merits.
